Script.name: Loginhandler
Script.script: function Loginhandler() sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Debug 20 ]]) -- sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Set [ "MG.char 1" ] ]]) sendGMCP( [[Core.Supports.Remove [ "Char 1" ] ]]) -- Wie kriegt man gmod dazu, wenn man nicht weiss, auf welchen User der Char registriert hat? gmod.registerUser("MG-Package") gmod.enableModule("MG-Package", "MG.char") gmod.enableModule("MG-Package", "MG.room") mainWidth, mainHeight = getMainWindowSize() createGauge("healthbar",150,20,mainWidth-380, mainHeight-40, nil, 0, 255, 50) createGauge("manabar",150, 20,mainWidth-380, mainHeight-20, nil, 0, 50, 200) end

Script.name: update_vitals
Script.script:
function update_vitals() hp_now = gmcp.MG.char.vitals.hp hp_max = gmcp.MG.char.maxvitals.max_hp mp_now = gmcp.MG.char.vitals.sp mp_max = gmcp.MG.char.maxvitals.max_sp
if hp_now < hp_old then flashHealthGauge(0.2) end hp_old = hp_now
setGauge("healthbar",hp_max, hp_now, ""..hp_now .. "/" ..hp_max.."") setGauge("manabar",mp_now ,mp_max , ""..mp_now .. "/" ..mp_max.."") end
function flashHealthGauge(duration) setBackgroundColor("healthbar", 255, 0, 0, 255) tempTimer(duration, [[ setPoisonStatus() ]]) end

Script.name: setPoisonStatus
Script.script: function setPoisonStatus() poison = gmcp.MG.char.vitals.poison if poison == 0 then r = 0 g = 255 b = 50 else -- Farbuebergang gelb->orange->rot r = 255 g = 255-val*25 b = 0 end setBackgroundColor("healthbar", r, g, b, 255) end
